seo.title: Hello World | ETI360
seo.description: Launching ETI360 with a Hello World story about structured travel decisions.

sections.headline: Hello world, meet ETI360
sections.bodyMarkdown: Hello world from ETI360’s new marketing site. This page proves the Sanity + Next.js build works end-to-end.

sections.headline: Why Hello World matters
sections.bodyMarkdown: Every journey starts with a hello. ETI360 documents how structured preparation builds confident travel decisions for schools.

sections.headline: Let’s talk
sections.bodyMarkdown: Ready for your first hello? Book a conversation and we’ll show how ETI360 keeps governance and mobility aligned.
